Accordion.root: w-full rounded-lg bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border shared-card
Accordion.itemButton: flex justify-between items-center w-full py-4 text-left font-medium text-foreground hover:bg-muted/50

Card.root: bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-md rounded-lg p-6 mb-4 border border-border shared-card
Card.title: text-xl font-semibold
Card.subtitle: text-muted-foreground text-sm

Dialog.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-gray-600 bg-opacity-50 overflow-y-auto h-full w-full z-50 flex justify-center items-center
Dialog.panel: relative p-5 border border-border w-96 rounded-md bg-card text-card-foreground shared-shadow-lg
Dialog.header: flex justify-between items-center pb-3 border-b border-border
Dialog.title: text-lg font-semibold

EmptyState.root: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-8 text-center bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border border-border shared-card
EmptyState.iconWrapper: w-12 h-12 mb-4 flex items-center justify-center text-primary/80
EmptyState.title: text-lg font-medium mb-2

LoadingState.root: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-8 text-center bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-lg border border-border shared-card

ErrorDisplay.root: bg-red-100 dark:bg-red-900 border border-red-400 dark:border-red-700 text-red-700 dark:text-red-300 px-4 py-3 rounded relative shared-shadow
ErrorDisplay.title: font-bold
ErrorDisplay.retryButton: mt-2 px-3 py-1 bg-red-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-red-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-red-500 focus:ring-opacity-50

JsonDisplay.title: text-xs text-muted-foreground mb-2
JsonDisplay.scrollArea: rounded border bg-muted/30 p-3 font-mono text-xs whitespace-pre-wrap

ListItemCard.title: text-lg font-medium
ListItemCard.subtitle: text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-1 line-clamp-2
ListItemCard.footer: flex items-center justify-between p-0 gap-2 mt-2

Table.th: px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-muted-foreground uppercase tracking-wider

Tabs.tabButtonBase: whitespace-nowrap py-3 px-1 border-b-2 font-medium text-sm transition-colors
